Bart vs. the Space Mutants.description: A single-player game where Bart Simpson, who can see aliens in disguise, must stop them from building a weapon to take over the world.
Bart vs. the Space Mutants.rom_file_location: /static/roms/nes/Simpsons, The - Bart vs. the Space Mutants (USA) (Rev 1).nes

Bart vs. the World.description: Bart travels around the world on a scavenger hunt, facing against Mr. Burns' family and agents.

Bartman Meets Radioactive Man.description: Bart Simpson transforms into Bartman and ventures into the comic book universe to rescue his kidnapped idol, Radioactive Man.

Krusty's Fun House.description: A puzzle game where the player, controlling Krusty the Clown, directs rats to an extermination area through a maze-like fun house.

Bart & the Beanstalk.description: Bart Simpson merges with the fairy tale of Jack and the Beanstalk, climbing a beanstalk and adventuring in a giant castle.

Bart vs. the Juggernauts.description: Bart Simpson becomes a contestant on a show called Juggernauts USA, where he takes on the Juggernauts for a chance to win big.
Bart vs. the Juggernauts.rom_file_location: /static/roms/gb/Simpsons, The - Bart vs. the Juggernauts (USA, Europe).gb

Itchy & Scratchy Miniature Golf Madness.description: Scratchy plays through a miniature golf course of nine holes while avoiding attacks from Itchy in this side-scrolling action platform game.
Itchy & Scratchy Miniature Golf Madness.rom_file_location: /static/roms/gb/Simpsons, The - Itchy & Scratchy - Miniature Golf Madness (USA, Europe).gb

Night of the Living Treehouse of Horror.description: Based on the Treehouse of Horror episodes, the game features seven levels where the player controls the Simpson family members.
Night of the Living Treehouse of Horror.rom_file_location: /static/roms/gbc/Simpsons, The - Night of the Living Treehouse of Horror (USA, Europe).gbc

The Simpsons: Road Rage.description: Mr. Burns buys all transit systems in Springfield and creates radioactive buses. Citizens must use their cars for safer public transport.

The Simpsons Game.description: The Simpsons Game is a platform game based on the animated television series. The game features an original storyline written by Simpsons writers.

Krusty's Super Fun House.description: Krusty the Clown has to exterminate rats in his fun house. The player controls Krusty through a series of side-scrolling levels.

Bart's Nightmare.description: Bart Simpson has to find his lost homework pages while navigating a series of strange dreams.

Virtual Bart.description: Bart Simpson has to navigate a series of virtual reality scenarios. Each scenario is a different game genre.
